I love how some people have stupid torrent-program settings. I've found 3 different seeds on this torrent that gave me a speed of 4-6 mb/sec, and as soon as i get up there it drops again. Like "we cant allow one peer to take up that much bandwidth so were shutting you down". Why the **** would you even put it that high in the first place if thats the policy of the program.
